## DocumentSyncStatus enum

`DocumentSyncStatus` represents the result of synchronizing the document with the server.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare enum DocumentSyncStatus 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  Synced | <code>&quot;synced&quot;</code> | <code>Synced</code> means that document synced successfully. |
|  SyncFailed | <code>&quot;sync-failed&quot;</code> | <code>SyncFiled</code> means that document synchronization has failed. |
